column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Not sure why this place was so hard to get a reservation at. I'm just not understanding the hype...but maybe that's all it is. Yes
column3: but nothing particularly breathtaking like everyone else seems to be claiming. Maybe we just had a mediocre experience. The service wasn't bad
column4: but I found myself glancing over my shoulder way too many times in anticipation of catching the waitress's attention. (Which I never successfully did. Just had to wait till she eventually came back.) Overall we had a nice time...Will I come back here? Probably not
column5: but I'm glad I tried it.
